title: Account transfer
body:
My friends traveled over to america and transfered their OCE accounts to LAS and they returned yesterday and now the transfer to OCE isnt available on their LAS client

is there any way for them to transfer their account or when will it be back up

replies.body:
It's usually patch related, but I'd recommend they submit a ticket to player support, they should be able to help one way or another.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
also are you able to check if brazil is able to transfer to OCE because they might need to transfer there and then back i guess
They really shouldn't have to. A PS ticket as Seras suggested is the way to go. They should be able to transfer your friends manually, though it would still cost the 2600 RP.
do u know how long it takes before it will be back up???. cause the patch was a couple days ago. and ticket support usually takes days to reply which is why i took to the boards
It's usually back up once both regions are on the same patch so I'm not sure what the delay is. I have no way of checking anything I'm afraid, I'm only a volunteer. Support is your best bet here.
